website_summaries.verdict: Though it has sleek and attractive looks the compact Braun PureMix JB7130BK can't match the performance of other midrange blenders including the KitchenAid 5-Speed Diamond.
pros: The Braun PureMix JB7130BK blender is sleek, compact and attractive
It has a large 56 ounce pitcher and runs quieter than competing models
cons: It lacks the power to blend difficult ingredients unless you give it some manual help
It uses a traditional blender design that's harder to clean and assemble than updated appliances
It doesn't come with a mixing spoon or tamper

customer_reviews.title: it broke the third time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because Consumer Reports said it was fairly quiet (for a blender) but it broke the third time I used it. Other reviews have identified the plastic gizmo at the bottom of the jug as a weak point and I should have listened to them. Braun has offered to ship me a replacement part, but I just took my old blender to Goodwill yesterday so now I'm blenderless until it arrives. Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money , burn smell and can’t crush anything
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I wish I could return. I bought it because it is Braun. A well known German company . It is expensive and can not even make a smoothie . It makes a burn smell after 30 seconds . People in the house tell me turn it off. It can’t smash big chunks of fruits . I didn’t even want to try ice. From 1 to 5 settings , 1 is stir , 5 is liquify , I only turn on 1 or 2 mode less than 30 seconds . A completely useless blender . Waste of money. Only you can make ripped banana with milk at low power
customer_reviews.author: Kaan

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Barely 1.5 months after purchase, and only 3-4 uses in this product has stopped working. A total waste of money and now I have to spend more money to purchase another blender. I thought I was buying a high-quality product given the brand name and the high reviews it received, but have been sorely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Broken after less than 2 years use.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good blender while it worked. I bought it in June 2016. It died today, Jan 2018. Happy new year!? Anyway. It was used about 5-10 times per month for smoothies We do not use ice cubes- just used to blend frozen berries and the like. The plastic gear from the base, that engages the blades broke off. Very frustrating. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jmags

customer_reviews.title: Good value; good performance.
customer_reviews.text: Great appliance for the money; great value. Performs well against much higher price competitors.
customer_reviews.author: RcsJupiter

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this item...serious design flaws!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this item for approximately 3 months and it is a paperweight now. The plastic piece that spins the blade is stripped out making the item useless. Meanwhile the cheap-o blender I have had as a backup for the past 6 years is still working thank goodness.
customer_reviews.author: MM honest

customer_reviews.title: Used for two months. I just used it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for two months. I just used it for making smoothies and the motor burned out blending a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander C. Hindman

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the Braun on 10/17/17 and it is broken ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Braun on 10/17/17 and it is broken already, two and half months after purchase. The blades will not spin event though the motor is working.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Paladino

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it, it's a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Templemon

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, easy to use, only downside; the lid stick little bit too much. Beside that is pretty good for a normal blender.
customer_reviews.author: Ojos

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in July, use it for smoothies only a couple of times a week....spinning part on the jug is plastic and completely worn down and will not engage with bottom, which is also plastic and starting to break down. Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! May look nice but it's really not all that. Used it to make watermelon juice and it only liquified at the bottom. If the load is too light it jumps and caused a huge mess in my kitchen so you have to hold it down which no one gave me a warning on. Definitely returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Tow Lee

customer_reviews.title: This product was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product was a waste of money. I bought it and 6 months later a smoky burnt smell comes out of the grinder whenever I use it. I cant even return it because I of the 30days return police. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: yewubdar guma

customer_reviews.title: Look cool and high quality but sadly it's 120 volt my ...
customer_reviews.text: Look cool and high quality but sadly it's 120 volt my house 220volt.. I didn't have chance to try it yet
customer_reviews.author: Fatimah

customer_reviews.title: This blender is awesome. My wife makes a smoothie every day and ...
customer_reviews.text: This blender is awesome. My wife makes a smoothie every day and it does an outstanding job. Crushes ice with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Partin

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, fits my small kitchen space perfectly, and best of all it does a lot better job of making smoothies then my last unit. It's quieter and doesn't scare my cat .
customer_reviews.author: TrikeMike

customer_reviews.title: much quieter than our previous blenders
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this one since consumer reports said it was quiet. It is much quieter than our previous blenders. It also works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely for me for the purpose I purchased it for. (making smoothies).
customer_reviews.author: MMJ fan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, Mines going in the trash after only a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I just found out my return policy expired 3 days ago. I would not re order this again. The jug continually tightens on the base and now we can not get it separated to be able to clean it. It started to do this last week which I was able to separate it at that time but not with out a piece of the clear job plastic splintering off. Now it is so damn tight it will not separate. I will continue to use it until I buy the replacement. Than this one can go into the trash
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S Capp

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this product because the first one stopped working the in the first week and the second had the jar jam on the blender and couldn't be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Kaluza

customer_reviews.title: Works great no problems and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works great no problems and easy to clean. cons... just watch out for the blades when cleaning they are very sharp...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good blender for the price
customer_reviews.text: Have been using our blender now for a couple of weeks. No complaints. Makes great smoothies. Easy enough to clean. Simple controls with no silly features and a practical number of speeds. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Speers

customer_reviews.title: Thus far, seems really great for smoothies. Pulverizes ice.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product based on its wattage and plastic parts. But being a fan of both Braun and deLonghi products, I took a chance and just consumed the best blended smothie I ever made. Impressed. Actually works better than the Kitchenaid that recently wound down. As for longevity, time will tell, but the blender cups available for smoothies with a dedicated additional blade is also a good feature. If I get a few years from this thing with daily use for smoothies, I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Good blender!
customer_reviews.text: "This product has been put at my disposal for no compensation and in order to share my honest and unbiased opinion. Once I have completed my testing it will be returned to the manufacturer." I had very high expectations due to the brand,I was excited to try this because my ninja is 5 years old and tired,I use the blender quite a few times a week from fruit smoothies to making purees, this blender did very well. Now the design is sleek and it looks very nice complementing my counter top but it lacks power when it comes to solid hard foods,ice etc overall if you will use for light use it's great and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: vicky658

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than a year. I used it for smoothies about 3 times per week. It did great until today when the plastic gear under the jug that engages with the bottom part just broke into little pcs. I looked all over the internet and couldn't find any replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Had the same problem as last comment. The plactic blades both are broken off in matter of 1 month having this and cannot find replacement parts for this!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Trying an awesome Braun pure mix Blender.
customer_reviews.text: I was lended this Awesome Braun Pure mix jug blender to try.I really have enjoyed crushing ice with it,makeing slushies,milkshakes and takeing apples and makeing puree.I would Personally Recommend this blender to any one wants to get the job done right.love to own one some day.connie pettit
customer_reviews.author: Connie pettit in united states

customer_reviews.title: Decent blender, but not a fan of the cheap plastic parts
customer_reviews.text: This blender has the speed and power to blend smoothies and crush ice, which is what I primarily use it for. But the plastic jug and plastic parts don't feel as sturdy as my KitchenAid blender which I've had for 12 years, which has a glass jug and heavy-duty plastic and rubberized parts.
customer_reviews.author: J Rose

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazing, love it my son will not stop asking for his smoothies. Never once complained about ice or fruit not being crushed or fruit being whole.
customer_reviews.author: rosa rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: No mix ups...only mix ins!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy and solid blender for sure. It's blades are sharp and do the job, no matter what I've thrown in it! I a smooth fanatic so this is nice. It's easy to use and to clean up as well. Just a quick rinse most of the time. Operating it is real easy and my mom said she wasn't confused by the buttons. It has good capacity and does exactly what I hoped. Thanks Braun!
customer_reviews.author: Mick McArt

customer_reviews.title: not good at all
customer_reviews.text: not happy at all with this blender's performance. my old braun blender was alot tougher and did not smell like something was burning every time i used it.
customer_reviews.author: pam sampson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this blinder!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blinder! It crushes ice in minutes and blends milkshakes and smoothies perfectly. My 14 yr old son loves smoothies and has made several with this blinder. Last night we made chocolate Oreo milkshakes, they were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kimbrel

customer_reviews.title: Just read it 🚽
customer_reviews.text: EVERY ONE OF THESE REVIEWERS GOT A #### FREE #### BLENDER !! ........ That's as in... FREE. Spent NO $$$$
customer_reviews.author: R. martin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product. Do not be tricked. Not quality German engineering.
customer_reviews.text: The Germans are great engineers and designers which make this blender so unacceptable. Works fair to poorly for intended task. Design is overly complex. Bottom easily stuck on with no where to grip. Leaves one feeling offended, tricked, and bamboozled. Would return but sadly no box or receipt to be found when finally used it and realized how bad it is.
customer_reviews.author: T. B.

customer_reviews.title: Some good and some things need improved.
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing this for honest opinion and am not being compensated. It has some good and bad things. Bad the blades as I was cleaning , cut my finger, I also do not like that the piture is plastic , glass is better, I liked that it could make my smoothies
customer_reviews.author: W. Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Easy push button controls.......  smooth crush ice system good, but loud.
customer_reviews.text: This nice blender is great for my Protein Smoothies. Plus, it looks attractive, is sturdy, and has the push button controls. This is good feature to have because then you don't have to worry about food particles and liquids getting between the buttons. However, the ice crusher pulverized into a snow cone state! It is called the "smooth crush" system. It is very fine pulverizing. And, it is loud! Very loud. Chopping is good with easy push button access. Mostly, I am making smoothies, protein and fruit smoothies. But, this blender is handy, works great, and makes great smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: 😺Zutto 😺

customer_reviews.title: Makes great smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and efficient, this makes a great smoothie without problems crushing ice. One problem I might be concerned about in the future is the fact that the turning mechanism on the base is plastic. Given the power of the machine comes from that attachment point, metal would be better, but I guess it's how things are made now. Still, it works great so far, and I expect it to keep working. If it breaks, I'll repost and change the review.
customer_reviews.author: Hedera Femme

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a blender that does its job and crushes all the ice. I've made margaritas and pureed a veg base for soup and this appliance does a stellar job. It's worth a few extra bucks if you want your machine to do what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I blended my usual smoothie of ground flax, frozen strawberries, quick oats, water, bananas and it came out great!
customer_reviews.author: Justmehere

product_meta.title: Braun JB7130BK PureMix Jug Blender, Black
product_meta.description: Blending new levels of ease and creativity, Braun's Pure Mix Blender, model JB7130BK, puts you in control for consistent results. It features a two-tone finish of stainless steel and black with unique Smooth Crush system as well as a 56 ounce capacity, BPA free plastic jug. Perfect for all your blending needs.
feature_bullets: Smooth Crush blade system- Optimum blending results, thanks to the exclusive combination of the specially designed jug and the higher positioning of the blade system
Illuminated control panel, sealed and easy to clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars102 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
